mapper.sql: ID, SUPPLIER_ID, START_TIME, TERM, PUNISH_TYPE, RELEASE_TYPE, REASON, OPERATION_ID, OPERATION_TYPE, OPERATION_NAME, OPERATION_DATE
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_SMS_BLACKLIST_LOG (ID, SUPPLIER_ID, START_TIME, TERM, PUNISH_TYPE, RELEASE_TYPE, REASON, OPERATION_ID, OPERATION_TYPE, OPERATION_NAME, OPERATION_DATE) values (#{id}, #{supplierId}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{term}, #{punishType}, #{releaseType}, #{reason}, #{operationId}, #{operationType}, #{operationName}, #{operationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into T_SES_SMS_BLACKLIST_LOG
ID,
SUPPLIER_ID,
START_TIME,
TERM,
PUNISH_TYPE,
RELEASE_TYPE,
REASON,
OPERATION_ID,
OPERATION_TYPE,
OPERATION_NAME,
OPERATION_DATE,
#{id},
#{supplierId},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{term},
#{punishType},
#{releaseType},
#{reason},
#{operationId},
#{operationType},
#{operationName},
#{operationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
select sys_guid() from dual
mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_BLACKLIST_LOG
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId},
START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TERM = #{term},
PUNISH_TYPE = #{punishType},
RELEASE_TYPE = #{releaseType},
REASON = #{reason},
OPERATION_ID = #{operationId},
OPERATION_TYPE = #{operationType},
OPERATION_NAME = #{operationName},
OPERATION_DATE = #{operationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id}

update T_SES_SMS_BLACKLIST_LOG set SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId}, START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TERM = #{term}, PUNISH_TYPE = #{punishType}, RELEASE_TYPE = #{releaseType}, REASON = #{reason}, OPERATION_ID = #{operationId}, OPERATION_TYPE = #{operationType}, OPERATION_NAME = #{operationName}, OPERATION_DATE = #{operationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id}
